Info.Description:
The Dark Elves, or the Druchii as they call themselves in their own tongue, also known as the Naggarothi or the "Dark Ones", are one of the most ancient, powerful, and certainly the most sadistic of the three Elven civilisations of the world.

In the bleak, chilly lands of the continent of Naggaroth in the New World lies the Dark Elven kingdoms of the Witch King Malekith, a realm born from the depths of malice and hate, a kingdom that seeks nothing more than to despoil a world its people believe loathes their existence. With malevolent eyes, the Dark Elves watch this dying world, knowing it is their birthright to rule all that they survey and those that live upon it are born to do nothing more than to grovel at their feet.

The Druchii are raiders, slavers and heartless reavers of the first degree, their every whim being nothing more than to sow misery and pain to all that oppose them, for misery and pain is the very lifeblood of their existence. Thus do their Black Arks and Corsair Fleets ply the great waters of the world, raiding and enslaving all before them as a tribute to their own avaricious desires

Magic.Name: The Lore of Dark Magic
Magic.Options: Lore of Fire, Shadow, Metal, Death

LocalOption.Darksword: Rule: Each wound inflicted on an enemy character or champion (after saves, etc) also deducts 1 from the model's S, A and T for the remainder of the game
LocalOption.CavalryShields: AddToArmour: 6; Rule: Not Fast Cavalry anymore

Additional.Name: The Hydra's Teeth
Additional.Description: The model has five Hydra's Teeth. Each can be used once as a thrown weapon with a range of 12". Declare how many of its Hydra's Teeth the model is throwing before rolling to hit - there is no 'multiple shots' penalty for throwing more than one tooth at a time. For each hit. make D6 WS2 S3 close combat attacks against the target unit. Up to two attacks per turn can be allocated by the Dark Elves player against each character or Champion in the unit

Arcana.Name: Crystal of Midnight
Arcana.Rule: Enemy Wizard must pass a Leadership test on 3D6 otherwise they forget one randomly spell. One use only.
Arcana.Description: One use only. Nominate another Wizard anywhere on the table at the start of any Dark Elves turn. The Wizard must pass a Leadership test on 3D6 otherwise they forget one randomly determined spell for the rest of the battle

Additional.Name: Black Dragon Egg
Additional.Rule: Toughness 6 and the Noxious Breath attack for 1 turn. One use only.
Additional.Description: One use only. The model may consume the Black Dragon Egg at the start of any player turn. For the remainder of that turn the model has Toughness 6 and the Noxious Breath attack

Additional.Name: Potion of Strength
Additional.Rule: Strength +3 for 1 turn. One use only.
Additional.Description: One use only. The model may drink this at the start of any close combat and it lasts until the start of the next player's turn. While it is in effect, the Potion of Strength grants +3 Strength

Additional.Name: Gem of Nightmares
Additional.Description: One use only. The Gem of Nightmares can be used at the start of any turn. Until the end of that turn, the model and any unit it has joined cause Fear

Additional.Name: The Guiding Eye
Additional.Rule: The character and any unit he joins may re-roll missed shooting to hit rolls. One use only.
Additional.Description: One use only. The character and any unit he joins may re-roll missed shooting to hit rolls

Weapon.Name: Venom Sword
Weapon.Rule: Any model that takes a wound from the Venom Sword (after saves, etc) must roll equal to or under its Toughness on 2D6 or automatically lose all remaining wounds.

Weapon.Name: Rending Stars
Weapon.Rule: Maximum Range: 12"; Strength: As user+1. Rules: Thrown weapon; multiple shot x3.
Weapon.Description: Maximum Range: 12"; Strength: As user+1.\nRules: Thrown weapon; multiple shot x3

Additional.Name: Dance of Doom
Additional.Description: The model has a 5+ ward save

Weapon.Name: Rune of Khaine
Weapon.Rule: The model has +D3 Attacks (rolled just before making the model's attacks)

Additional.Name: Witchbrew
Additional.Rule: Witchbrew affects the Hag's unit for the entire battle. Enemy units cannot claim combat resolution bonuses for outnumbering, flank or rear attacks, or higher ground if they are only fighting a unit affected by Witchbrew

Weapon.Name: Cloak of Twilight
Weapon.Rule: Bound spell, power level 3. The Cloak of Twilight contains the Steed of Shadows spell from the Lore of Shadows

Weapon.Name: Hand of Khaine
Weapon.Rule: One model in base contact chosen by the Dark Elves player, or the model's opponent in a challenge, loses one Attack (to a minimum of 1)
Weapon.Description: One model in base contact chosen by the Dark Elves player, or the model's opponent in a challenge, loses one Attack (to a minimum of 1). Against mounted models, the Dark Elves player must choose either the mount or the rider. If the model has special types of attack (a Giant, for example) the Hand of Khaine has no effect. Models that are Immune to Psychology are unaffected by the Hand of Khaine

Weapon.Name: Cry of War
Weapon.Rule: A unit charged by a warrior with a Cry of War must pass a Leadership test or reduce their Weapon Skill by 1 (to a minimum of 1) for that Close Combat

Weapon.Name: Manbane
Weapon.Rule: A model counts Strength as one higher than their target's Toughness
Weapon.Description: A model with a weapon coated with Manbane always counts their Strength as one higher than their target's Toughness, unless their Strength would normally be more than this, up to a maximum of Strength 6. This means that they almost always wound opponents on a roll of 3+. This modified Strength is used to calculate armour save modifiers

Weapon.Name: Black Lotus
Weapon.Description: The model may re-roll any dice that score a 1 when rolling to wound with a weapon coated With Black Lotus

Weapon.Name: Dark Venom
Weapon.Rule: Wounds inflicted in the challenge that round are doubled for the purposes of combat resolution scores
Weapon.Description: If a model with Dark Venom slays an enemy in a challenge, all wounds inflicted by the model in the challenge that round are doubled for the purposes of combat resolution scores (up to the overkill maximum)

Weapon.Name: Executioner's Axe
Weapon.Description: Requires two hands. Strikes last. In close combat, the wielder counts as having a Strength double that of their target's Toughness, up to a maximum of Strength 10. In addition, the Executioner's Axe causes D3 wounds

Weapon.Name: Sword of Ruin
Weapon.Description: No armour saves may be taken against hits from the Sword of Ruin

Weapon.Name: Web of Shadows
Weapon.Rule: Enemy automatically takes 2D6 Strength 3 hits. One use only
Weapon.Description: One use only. The character uses the Web of Shadows instead of making any normal attacks that round. When used, one model in base contact with the character automatically takes 2D6 Strength 3 hits. Wounds caused do not carry over on to other models. A model with the Web of Shadows may instead choose to use a mundane weapon in any round of combat

Weapon.Name: Chillblade
Weapon.Description: Enemy models suffering hits from the Chillblade must pass a Toughness test for every hit. If a test is failed the model suffers a wound with no armour save. Models suffering a wound (after ward saves, etc) may not make any close combat attacks that turn. No normal roll to wound is made for attacks with the Chillblade

Weapon.Name: Heartseeker
Weapon.Description: The character may re-roll all failed rolls to hit and to wound in close combat

Weapon.Name: Hydra Blade
Weapon.Description: A character wielding the Hydra Blade gains D3 additional attacks (roll just before making attacks)

Weapon.Name: Caledor's Bane
Weapon.Rule: Enemy may not use Scaly Skin saving
Weapon.Description: +3 Strength on the charge. Models may not use Scaly Skin saving throws against hits from Caledor's Bane

Weapon.Name: Dagger of Hotek
Weapon.Description: The Dagger of Hotek is an additional hand weapon, (it can be used with a mundane hand weapon) and grants the bearer the Always Strikes First special rule

Weapon.Name: Lifetaker
Weapon.Rule: Crossbow with Range 30", Strength 4, multiple shot x3, hits on a roll of 2+
Weapon.Description: Crossbow with Range 30", Strength 4, multiple shot x3. Lifetaker always hits on a roll of 2+, regardless of any to hit modifiers, magic items, etc

Weapon.Name: Crimson Death
Weapon.Description: Requires two hands to use. A model wielding Crimson Death always strikes with Strength 6. No other modifiers or magic items can ever modify this

Weapon.Name: Whip of Agony
Weapon.Description: Beastmaster's scourge. A model wielding the Whip of Agony always strikes with Strength 5. No other modifiers or magic items can ever modify this

Armour.Name: Armour of Living Death
Armour.Description: Heavy armour. In addition, the model has +1 Toughness and +1 Wound. Roll a D6 before deploying any models. On a roll of a 1, the wearer succumbs to the Armour of Living Death and is subject to stupidity for the battle

Armour.Name: Armour of Eternal Servitude
Armour.Description: Heavy armour. The wearer can Regenerate

Additional.Name: Cloak of Hag Graef
Additional.Rule: Any ranged attack hits on the character have their Strength halved
Additional.Description: Sea Dragon cloak. In addition, any ranged attack hits on the character (including shooting, magic missiles and other spells with a Strength value) have their Strength halved before rolling to wound (rounding up)

Armour.Name: Armour of Darkness
Armour.Description: This armour gives a total save of 1+ that cannot be further increased in any way (with a shield, chariot, mount and so on)

Shield.Name: Shield of Ghrond
Shield.Rule: All hits the character suffers will be resolved with -1 Strength
Shield.Description: The Shield of Ghrond is treated like a normal shield, and in addition all hits the character suffers will be resolved with -1 Strength

Armour.Name: Blood Armour
Armour.Rule: For every inflicted wound in close combat, armour save is improved by one point
Armour.Description: Heavy armour. For every unsaved wound the wearer inflicts in close combat, this save is improved by one point (to 4+ then 3+, etc) to a maximum total of 1+ (including any other bonuses for a shield. Sea Dragon cloak, and so on)

Additional.Name: Black Amulet
Additional.Rule: If ward save test is passed, the attacking model suffers 1 wound instead (with no armour save allowed)
Additional.Description: The wearer has a 4+ ward save. If the wearer of the Black Amulet passes their ward save in close combat, then the attacking model suffers 1 wound instead (with no armour save allowed)

Additional.Name: Ring of Darkness
Additional.Rule: All attacks directed against the model are at half WS or half BS
Additional.Description: All close combat attacks directed against the model are at half WS. Any shooting at the character or their unit is at half BS. Round fractions up

Additional.Name: Pendant of Khaeleth
Additional.Rule: Ward save, based upon the Strength
Additional.Description: This gives a ward save, based upon the Strength of the hit. Roll a D6 for every wound suffered by the wearer, on a roll equal to or under the attack's Strength, the hit is ignored. Rolls of 6 always fail

Additional.Name: Seal of Ghrond
Additional.Description: Add 1 dice to the dispel dice pool

Armour.Name: Pearl of Infinite Bleakness
Armour.Description: The character and his unit are Immune to Psychology

Additional.Name: Ring of Hotek
Additional.Rule: Any Wizard (friend or foe) within 12" suffer a Miscast on the roll of any double
Additional.Description: Any Wizard (friend or foe) attempting to cast or target a spell within 12" of the wearer will suffer a Miscast on the roll of any double

Additional.Name: Null Talisman
Additional.Description: The Null Talisman grants magic resistance (1). Models may carry multiple Null Talismans, just like scrolls, and their effects are cumulative. For example, two Talismans confer magic resistance (2)

Arcane.Name: Black Staff
Arcane.Rule: Bound Spell, Power Level 4. Contains the Power of Darkness spell

Arcane.Name: Focus Familiar
Arcane.Rule: The wielder cast spells from a different position on the battlefield
Arcane.Description: The Focus Familiar allows the wielder to cast spells from a different position on the battlefield. Place a marker at the start of each Dark Elf Magic phase within 6" of the Sorceress and at least 1" away from enemies. She may use this position when determining range and line of sight for her spells, and whether she counts as in combat or not

Arcane.Name: Darkstar Cloak
Arcane.Description: The cloak gives the Sorceress +1 power dice in each Magic phase. Only she may use this extra dice

Arcane.Name: Sacrificial Dagger
Arcane.Rule: Sacrifice a model to get a casting dice
Arcane.Description: Once per spell-casting attempt, after the casting dice have been rolled, the Sorceress may sacrifice a model in a unit she has joined - the model is removed immediately. The Sorceress gains a power dice that must be rolled and added to the casting total (before dispel attempts). Note that it is possible for the unit to require a panic test if she sacrifices 25+% of the unit in a single Magic Phase!

Arcane.Name: Tome of Furion
Arcane.Description: The Tome of Furion grants its bearer 1 additional spell

Banner.Name: Banner of Nagarythe
Banner.Description: This standard gives an additional +1 to the combat resolution score of friendly units in combat within 12", and the unit containing the banner is Unbreakable

Banner.Name: Hydra Banner
Banner.Description: All models in the unit gain +1 Attack in the first round of any hand-to-hand combat (including mounts)

Banner.Name: Dread Banner
Banner.Description: The unit carrying this standard causes Fear

Banner.Name: Standard of Slaughter
Banner.Description: On any turn the unit with the Standard of Slaughter charges, the banner adds +D3 to the unit's combat resolution

Banner.Name: Standard of Hag Graef
Banner.Description: All models in the unit containing the Standard of Hag Graef gain the Always Strikes First rule

Banner.Name: Sea Serpent Standard
Banner.Description: Corsairs only. The unit is subject to the rules for Frenzy

Banner.Name: Banner of Murder
Banner.Description: A unit with the Banner of Murder gains the Armour Piercing rule

Banner.Name: Banner of Cold Blood
Banner.Rule: Unit takes any Leadership tests on 3D6 and discards the highest D6, one use only
Banner.Description: One use only. Announce that the unit is using the banner at the start of any player turn. For the duration of that turn, the unit containing the banner takes any Leadership tests on 3D6 and the Dark Elves player discards the highest D6 roll before comparing the score to the unit's Leadership value

SpecialRules.Original: Any unit in Malekith's army that is within 12" of him automatically passes all panic tests

HandWeapon.Name: Destroyer
HandWeapon.Rule: Destroying magic items or castng Level on a D6 roll of 4+ for each successful hit

Armour.Name: Spellshield
Armour.Rule: If a spell cast at Malekith is dispelled by a dispel roll, the caster suffers a Strength 6 hit
For Bound Items, the Spellshield inflicts one Strength 6 hit

Arcane.Name: Enchanting Beauty
Arcane.Rule: Any model in base contact with Morathi at the start of the Close Combat phase must pass a Leadership test or is reduced to Weapon Skill 1 until the end of the phase

Arcane.Name: The First Sorceress
Arcane.Rule: Knows all of the spells from the Lore of Dark Magic
In addition, Morathi adds +1 to all casting rolls

HandWeapon.Name: Parrying Blade
HandWeapon.Rule: One model in base contact loses one Attack (to a minimum of 1)

Arcane.Name: Amulet of Fire
Arcane.Rule: The first spell cast against Hellebron is dispelled on a D6 roll of 4+

Hero.Name: Malus Darkblade
Hero.Description: Malus Darkblade, Scion of Hag Graef

Demon.Name: Tz'arkan
Demon.Rule: If Malus is in base contact with a friendly model and not in contact with the enemy in any close combat phase, roll a D6. On a 1-3 Tz'arkan's murderous rage drives Malus to attack his allies

Original.Rule: Any model that takes a wound from the Venom Sword (after saves, etc) must roll equal to or under its Toughness on 2D6 or automatically lose all remaining wounds.
Maximum Range: 12"; Strength: As user+1. Rules: Thrown weapon; multiple shot x3.
One model in base contact chosen by the Dark Elves player, or the model's opponent in a challenge, loses one Attack (to a minimum of 1)
Wounds inflicted in the challenge that round are doubled for the purposes of combat resolution scores

Hero.Name: Lokhir Fellheart
Hero.Description: Lokhir Fellheart, Captain of the Tower of Blessed Dread

HandWeapon.Name: The Red Blades
HandWeapon.Rule: Gains additional attacks in close combat equal to the number of ranks in the enemy unit he is attacking
